trans-unit.target: TEXT_COMGRD003_01563_SEQ_00<tab>One man's scourge is another man's chance to splurge, and Lieutenant Scarlet can help you find reason in this rhyme.

TEXT_COMGRD003_01563_SEQ_01<tab>Lieutenant Scarlet informs you that the Eorzean Alliance has instituted a bounty system called the Hunt. For the finer points of this most profitable venture, you must speak with the Hunt billmaster within the Adders' Nest.

TEXT_COMGRD003_01563_SEQ_02<tab>The Hunt billmaster has briefed you on the fundamentals of the Hunt. Whether you seek more advice or wish to spend your hard-earned Allied Seals, he is the man with whom you must speak. Do your part to preserve the peace, and you will be richly rewarded.
TEXT_COMGRD003_01563_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Hunt billmaster at the Adders' Nest.
TEXT_COMGRD003_01563_SCARLET_000_000<tab>Gloryhounds such as yourself will be pleased to have this news from the powers that be: the Eorzean Alliance has established a new system known as the Hunt.

TEXT_COMGRD003_01563_SCARLET_000_001<tab>We never lack for creatures and men that disturb the sylvan serenity. Henceforth these miscreants shall be <var 1A 02 /var>marked<var 1A 01 /var> for felling, and whoever deals the blow shall collect a reward. 'Tis a bounty system, when all's said and done.

TEXT_COMGRD003_01563_SCARLET_000_002<tab>The Alliance makes much of this joining of sword hands, while allowing rivalries to go unchecked elsewhere. Small wonder that some see a bent branch where we claim a bough true and proud.
TEXT_COMGRD003_01563_SCARLET_100_002<tab>But these are matters for our betters to ponder. For now, you may serve by offering the Hunt your considerable talent for slaughter.

TEXT_COMGRD003_01563_SCARLET_000_003<tab>The bounty is rich, and you stand to gain much for your services. But don't take my word for it─speak with the Hunt billmaster to learn of rewards and other such details.
TEXT_COMGRD003_01563_SCARLET_000_005<tab>The Hunt is a bounty system when all's said and done, and a rich bounty it is indeed. Ask the Hunt billmaster if you would know more.
TEXT_COMGRD003_01563_MOBOFFICER_000_010<tab>Here to join the Hunt, are you? Excellent, excellent. I'll get right into the explanation.
TEXT_COMGRD003_01563_MOBOFFICER_000_011<tab>First things first, you'll want to take a look at this Hunt board. There are bills for all sorts of marks here.

TEXT_COMGRD003_01563_MOBOFFICER_000_012<tab>There are <var 1A 02 /var>two<var 1A 01 /var> kinds of bills. The kind for regular marks and the kind for elite marks. The second of these are the more <var 1A 02 /var>notorious<var 1A 01 /var> sort. Before you go after one of them, I recommend you consult a hunter-scholar. These people are veterans of the Hunt who can recite the Raimdelle Codex by heart.
TEXT_COMGRD003_01563_MOBOFFICER_000_013<tab>Once the Hunt's done, you'll receive tokens called Allied Seals, which you can exchange for exclusive wares.

TEXT_COMGRD003_01563_MOBOFFICER_000_014<tab>If any of that got stuck going down, you're welcome to come back and ask again...and again, no doubt. I can attend to any Allied Seals you'd like to spend as well.
